title: Newcastle's Record Deal
description:
The FC crew react to Alexander Isak closing in on a £60M move to Newcastle United and question why so many players are transferring clubs for such massive fees this summer. Plus, the guys discuss Manchester United readying a bid of up to £90M for Ajax's Antony and argue if Harry Maguire needs to leave Man United this summer.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Newcastle closes in on Alexander Isak deal; Will Saint-Maximin make France's World Cup squad?; Man United ready massive Antony bid
